channel.title: Victoria #464
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YiVbGUT.png[/img] [i]Victoria #464 is a project based on the framework of Hyperion.[/i] [i]Expect moderately slow updates, as this is a long term project.[/i][/center]
[b]Core Features:[/b]
- Update Server. - MINA core. - Event, Action, and Task systems. - Heavily documented.
[b]Skilling Features:[/b]
- Agility - Crafting - Cooking - Construction - Farming - Fishing - Firemaking * Burning every kind of log. - Fletching - Herblore - Hunter - Prayer - Mining - Runecrafting - Slayer - Smithing - Thieving - Woodcutting * Axes from bronze to rune. * Every tree is working. * Trees turning into stumps. * Perfect formulas. * Perfect timers.
[right][b]Credits:[/b]
Hyperion Team Rs2 Server Team
[/right]
[center][b]Update Log:[/b]
[code] 6. Started on Firemaking. 5. Completed Woodcutting. 4. Started on the Woodcutting base. 3. Started on the skill handling system. 2. Fixed a trading bug with the interface. 1. Downloaded clean Hyperion. [/code][/center]
[center]Few Images:[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NcAC2iR.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/kVLjOOA.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Victoria #464
item.dc:creator: @JDETSC JDETSC
item.description:
@JDETSC wrote:

It’s a little to late.

I don’t even save backups for my server, since I never add things that are not mine. I degraded the 468 to 450, a month ago, when I stopped working on the 468. I may still have the 468 on my F Drive along with the other 2 projects. Mod Dsun should have it as he literally has 30 flash drives of files, and 1300 gbs of memory on his desktop. I’ll leave him a note as I stated he will be posting the next couple days.

I’m out! K.I.T Docent ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Victoria #464
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

JDETSC:

oh lol, will I don’t know what to tell you :D. I used the client I have been programming the past 4 months. It was initially a 317 loading 474 interfaces, gameframe. But I degraded it. I’m not sure If I should give you the client, as the only people who have the 468 is me, and Mod dsun.

I wont publicly release it. I only use private servers for their original use to be PRIVATE servers. I only play localhost.

Read full topic

item.description:

JDETSC:

go to server downloads and enzo (delta+ 2.0) posted a link to a fairly close revision.

Any client that runs the 468 cache you have? im dying to test it out. And also, Delta’s dont seem to want to cooperate on my Mac.

item.title: Victoria #464
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“JDETSC, post:2, topic:528598”]Sorry but, Runescape is #468 and it has the 474 gameframe look???

Goodluck![/quote]
Actually, 474 is the main revision looked at. In reality, that ‘474 gameframe’ was in a previous revision.

[quote=“Arcik, post:3, topic:528598”]I love the name!

100% SUPPORT![/quote]
Of course you do

[hr]

Hyperion always gets my luck.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“JDETSC, post:2, topic:528598”]Sorry but, Runescape is #468 and it has the 474 gameframe look???

item.title: Victoria #464
item.dc:creator: @Anval Anval
item.description:
@Anval wrote:

[center]
Victoria #464 is a project based on the framework of Hyperion.
Expect moderately slow updates, as this is a long term project.[/center]

Core Features:

  • Update Server.
  • MINA core.
  • Event, Action, and Task systems.
  • Heavily documented.

Skilling Features:

  • Agility
  • Crafting
  • Cooking
  • Construction
  • Farming
  • Fishing
  • Firemaking
  • Burning every kind of log.
  • Fletching
  • Herblore
  • Hunter
  • Prayer
  • Mining
  • Runecrafting
  • Slayer
  • Smithing
  • Thieving
  • Woodcutting
  • Axes from bronze to rune.
  • Every tree is working.
  • Trees turning into stumps.
  • Perfect formulas.
  • Perfect timers.

[right]Credits:

Hyperion Team
Rs2 Server Team

[/right]

[center]Update Log:

[code]
6. Started on Firemaking.
5. Completed Woodcutting.
4. Started on the Woodcutting base.
3. Started on the skill handling system.
2. Fixed a trading bug with the interface.

  1. Downloaded clean Hyperion.
    [/code][/center]
